page.title: 12 LUXURY ITEMS
page.content: I interviewed 93 people and asked them which luxury items they possesed. The most common item was the stereo record player with a total of 57. The thing that was least popular was the dish washer with a total of 12. This is the order that they came in, stereo 57 people tumble dryer 42 people video recorder 38 people computer 32 people micro wave cooker 30 people food mixer 27 people coffee maker 24 people special telephone 14 people new car 14 people dish washer 12 people Luxury items are expensive, often electrical goods, which people buy for pleasure rather than need.
